Package: unacloud.task.queue

[Java] Class QueueTaskerControl

    • unacloud.task.queue.QueueTaskerControl

    • Class used to put task in queue messaging service that will be read by Control project

      Authors:
      CesarF

      • Field Summary

          private static unacloud.share.queue.QueueTaskerConnection  controlQueue Represents class to connect to queue provider
